name: Ricochet HD
description:
Ricochet HD is an intense action game combining equal parts skill and strategy. With the most comprehensive feature set of any game in this genre, Ricochet HD's dynamic and interactive brick busting levels reward strategic play while the arsenal of power-ups allows you to obliterate everything in your path. 150 dynamic multi-staged unlocking levels deliver hours of non-stop action. Features include:

• Three exciting game modes: Solo, Head to Head or Co-op
• Dozens of ships each with its own special weapon set
• Customizable balls
• An intense mini game where you collect rings to up your rank and unlock special power-ups
